messages.message:
Hey team, just sharing a really awesome example of where the new(ish) advanced model capabilities make a big difference. In this example, the instructions given state that the date below the text should be ignored and you should refer to a different section of the legal document instead (the 'Acknowledgement'). Switching on the advanced model allows us to now find the correct answer in another section (which is also handwritten btw):the_horns: Previously we would have struggled to prompt a way out of this since underlying intelligence is really the limiter here

cc @Will McDermott @gabrielle.cecchi
nice! we've added the same option for list of objects recently as well. would be keen to hear if you have any docs where you've struggled with list fields and if using advanced model there helps.
